Package com.emse.spring.faircorp.api

Class WindowController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.emse.spring.faircorp.api.WindowController
  • @RestController
@RequestMapping("/api/windows")
@CrossOrigin
public class WindowController
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a REST controller for the window with Spring. It can get the windows list, add a window, get a single window, delete a room, switch a window status.

                                                       java.lang.Long id)

public com.emse.spring.faircorp.dto.WindowDto switchStatus​(@PathVariable

      • create

        @PostMapping
public com.emse.spring.faircorp.dto.WindowDto create​(@RequestBody
                                                     com.emse.spring.faircorp.dto.WindowDto dto)
        A REST request to Create (POST) a window.
        Parameters:
        dto - a window with a constructor (id, name, windowStatus, roomName, roomId).
        Returns:
        WindowDto A class that its constructor contains infos about the window.
